transcription.speaker: Speaker 1
transcription.text: I'm not talking about the stuff that falls from the sky and hits you on the head. I'm talking about this definition to greet or acclaim enthusiastically, which is I think how our words will be received if we stand on these four things. So what do they stand for? See if you can guess. The H, honesty, of course, being true in what you say, being straight and clear. The A is authenticity, just being yourself. A friend of mine described it as standing in your own truth, which I think is a lovely way to put it. The I is intent,
